gui.frame

Class NKFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • gui.frame.NKFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class NKFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    A class extended from JFrame custom made for NKSD Copy Center. Generates a UI that is similar to the program for the previous year.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Phil Adriaan
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • drawTable

        public void drawTable(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> the_data,
             java.util.List<java.lang.String> the_header)
        Updates the current table from a collection of data. Used only to update and refresh current table and not for creating new tables.
        Parameters:
        the_data - A 2D list of data to be updated on the table. The data represented on the table will be in the exact same structure as the data ordered in the 2D list.

      • getLocationFilterBox

        public NKComboBox getLocationFilterBox()
        Gets the location filter box used in the users panel.
        Returns:
        The drop down menu to be used in the users panel for filtering

      • getTextPane

        public javax.swing.JTextPane getTextPane()
        Gets the current text pane.
        Returns:

      • getTable

        public NKTable getTable()
        Gets the current Table.
        Returns:
        Current instance of the table. will only give correct information if the current panel is the order panel.

      • setPanel

        public void setPanel(PanelEnum the_panel_enum,
            java.lang.String the_message)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Changes the panel to a new panel. This method will rename the title to the desired panel, remove the old panel if there is any, and create a new panel according to the desired panel. The panel will then be refreshed to show it on screen. It will also configure all panel specific components to the default state. Some of it include the order filter button and the user filter drop down menu.
        Parameters:
        the_panel_enum - Screen to be changed to.
        the_message - Message to be displayed if the panel to be changed is the message screen.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
